channel.title: CVE Feed for Uncanny Owl -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Uncanny Owl -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-39656|2024-08-01T21:47:16.134Z -- uncanny%20owl -- tin%20canny%20reporting%20for%20learndash
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Uncanny Owl Tin Canny Reporting for LearnDash allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Tin Canny Reporting for LearnDash: from n/a through 4.3.0.7.
